title: Greatsword +1

Greatsword +1 Notes & Tips

Not all items will be sold at the same time. Leveling up or completing a Long Rest will reset the shop and potenially show different items. Rarity: Uncommon Value: 1000 Gp. Weight: 2.7 Kg. ID: WPN_Greatsword_1
